entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
